title: Acupuntura - Barcelona Physiotherapy
author: Rebecca
description: Lucy has 10 years of experience using acupuncture to complement her physiotherapy treatment. She also uses cupping and gua sha where appropriate.
text:
Acupunctura
[Lucy](https://barcelonaphysio.com/sobre-nosotros/) es miembro acreditado de la [Acupuncture Association of Chartered Physiotherapists](http://www.aacp.org.uk/) (AACP) en el Reino Unido.
La acupuntura está basada en estudios científicos y pruebas clínicas avaladas, y se emplea en la fisioterapia como parte de un enfoque combinado en la gestión del dolor y la inflamación.
En los tratamientos de acupuntura se utilizan agujas esterilizadas de un solo uso, de diversos tamaños y fabricadas con distintos materiales.
En cada sesión se utilizan varias agujas que pueden permanecer colocadas en la piel hasta 30 minutos antes de ser retiradas.
Si quieres saber más sobre nuestros tratamientos, llámanos al
[+34 644 291 241](tel:+34 644 291 241) y lo comentamos sin compromiso, o envíanos un correo electrónico a través de la [página de contacto](https://barcelonaphysio.com/contacto/).
Testimonios
After my first session with Lucy I came out flying! I felt loose and relaxed and my children said i looked taller. I was really impressed by how thoroughly she assessed my problem and was able to explain (great analogies!) what was going on.
I’ve had headaches from neck/shoulder pain for 20+ years, and had seen various bodywork specialists – osteopathy, quiropractic, massage, acupuncture, “mutua” physiotherapy classes – with only minor results.
Now 5 sessions later, with Lucy tailoring her many skills to my needs each session, I feel well informed and armed with loads of simple and enjoyable exercises to maintain my improved state at home.
She is also a really warm and fun woman to work with as well as being an accomplished professional. Well worth the money, I can’t recommend her highly enough.
